medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began five days prior to admission after eating a steak and cheese sub. The patient has experienced severe chills, a fever reaching ___ last night, and now shows intolerance to oral intake. Most pain is in the right upper quadrant of the abdomen.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of coronary artery disease with stent placement, hypertension, right upper quadrant lipoma excision, left skin graft after 2nd degree burns.
medical_history.family_history: Significant for diabetes and heart disease on the maternal side.
